definitions.definition: gradually but firmly establish (an idea or attitude, especially a desirable one) in a person's mind.
examples: how do we instill a sense of rightness in today's youth?
synonyms: drill (into) "we instill vigilance in our children"imbue
inject; indoctrinate; teach "he instilled Monet with a love of nature"

definitions.definition: put (a substance) into something in the form of liquid drops.
examples: she was told how to instill eye drops
